column1:
mmf72lego,"2022-04-10T11:27:39.35Z","Fine nice vignet","

I bought this set recently at a very nice discount price (&euro
column2: 7,99) at a well known dutch drugstore (Kruidvat). As an AFOL I was triggerd by the nice colorfull pieces for which I have all kinds of alternate ideas.&nbsp

column1: But before re-using I built the main vignet with the dolfin and the turtle.&nbsp
That is a fine nice little experience with good part-use and: the way both animals flote above the service is nice!&nbsp
With the new piece is light blue 67810 in medium azure&nbsp
column2: I guess this is a little set AFOL&#39
column3: s will like as much as the kids, for which the 3 builds are nice.

column1:
,TRUE,4,5,4,3,5 tmdguru500","2022-04-15T16:42:25.567Z","Creative set but could do more with the 3 in 1","

I bought this set for my 5 year-old
column2: daughter to challenge him. She was okay for the start, but then got stuck on building on the fish. In the end, I helped her to finish it.&nbsp
ve bought a 3-in-1 set. I like that there&#39
column3: s more than one ay to build it. What could be helpful is to indicate more clearly which version is easier and which one is harder.&nbsp

column1: - Fish was complicated. (even for me - maybe I have a hard time visualizing)
- I felt this set was a bit lonely. Maybe good that goes well with the fish tank set.
Overall it was a good bit of fun with my daugher.
